thread.title: Coca-Cola names long-time exec James Quincey COO and president
thread.title_full: Coca-Cola names long-time exec James Quincey COO and president - MarketWatch

author: Trey Williams
title: Coca-Cola names long-time exec James Quincey COO and president
text: The Coca-Cola Company KO, -0.53% on Thursday said that James Quincey will be the company's new chief operating officer and president effective immediately. Quincey has been with Coca-Cola for 19 years, serving as president of the company's Europe group since 2013. Quincey was instrumental in leading the recently proposed merger to form Coca-Cola European Partners Plc, in what would be the world's largest independent Coca-Cola bottler based on net revenues, according to a statement. Quincey will now oversee the company's Global Operations.
